languages.text: "Твоя тропа мне знакома. Как и шипы смирения под твоей одеждой. Кто... наставлял тебя?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
languages.original_text: "Твоя тропа мне знакома. Как и шипы смирения под твоей одеждой. Кто... наставлял тебя?"

traits.locale_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
"Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

languages.text: «Reconozco su hilo... y las espinas de humildad que lleva bajo la ropa. ¿Quién... le instruyó?».
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

traits.locale_text: «Reconozco su hilo... y las espinas de humildad que lleva bajo la ropa. ¿Quién... le instruyó?».

languages.text: 「その糸にはなじみがあります。服の下の謙遜の棘にも。誰が…指示を出したのです？」
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

traits.locale_text: 「その糸にはなじみがあります。服の下の謙遜の棘にも。誰が…指示を出したのです？」

languages.text: “你的丝线我很熟悉，衣物之下谦卑的尖刺我也同样熟悉。是谁……教会你这些的？”
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

traits.locale_text: “你的丝线我很熟悉，衣物之下谦卑的尖刺我也同样熟悉。是谁……教会你这些的？”

languages.text: "Euer Faden ist mir vertraut. Genau wie die Dornen der Demut unter Eurer Kleidung. Wer ... hat Euch unterrichtet?"
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

traits.locale_text: "Euer Faden ist mir vertraut. Genau wie die Dornen der Demut unter Eurer Kleidung. Wer ... hat Euch unterrichtet?"

languages.text: « Votre fil m'est familier, tout comme les épines d'humilité dissimulées sous vos vêtements. Qui... qui vous a formé ? »
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre fil m'est familier, tout comme les épines d'humilité dissimulées sous vos vêtements. Qui... qui vous a formé ? »

languages.text: "İpliğine aşinayım. Tevazunun kıyafetlerinin altında sakladığın dikenlerine de aşinayım. Sana... Talimatı kim verdi?"
languages.original_text: "Your thread is familiar to me. As are the thorns of humility under your clothes. Who... instructed you?"
